title: Intro Exper Methods AE
description: Introduction to laboratory instrumentation and measurement techniques used in aerospace. Basic application of sensor principles, uncertainty analysis, interpretation and analysis of experimental data, and documentation.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: AE 1601 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or PHYS 2232 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and COE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
